name: pplconnect Inc.
overview:
pplconnect’s solution is the evolution of the smartphone, a smartphone built for 2013. With pplconnect, users can access and use their smartphone from any web-connected device. Make a call from a tablet, receive a text on a computer, modify a contact on a friend’s phone, users are completely independent. pplconnect is device and OS agnostic and offers the only Virtual Smartphone.

At the core of pplconnect is the team. A cross‐functional team that wants “to do amazing things”. We have created a positive work environment by carefully selecting team players that have a deep skill set and excel in a cross‐functional environment. Denzil D’Sa and Jenviev Azzolin founded the company in September 2011 with the vision to drive positive social disruption to the mobile industry by building customer-centered mobile solutions.

A young dynamic team with numerous years of experience in product innovation, new media and a passion for creating customer value. With past successes including private jet launches at Bombardier, mass marketing at MEGA Bloks and technology development at the Canadian Space Agency. Both founders, Denzil D’Sa and Jenviev Azzolin, thrive on innovation and want to bring positive social change to people everywhere by providing them with mobile freedom.
